email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of wheat from Santos to Shanghai under CFR terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, and the initial freight quote is USD 48/mt.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lisa Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

Thank you for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering it to USD 45/mt?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Alex Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 46/mt. The demurrage rate is set at USD 12,000 per day.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lisa Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 46/mt, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Alex Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Alex,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lisa Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Alex Martinez
